attributes.action: Reinstate the BBC Sounds app internationally for all UK expats.
attributes.additional_details: The BBC recently made the BBC Sounds App unavailable overseas, cutting off thousands of UK ex patriots from news and entertainment. This culturally disconnects British nationals living overseas from their home.
attributes.background: For the government to instruct the BBC to reinstate the BBC Sounds App internationally

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about this are a matter for the BBC, not the UK Government or Parliament.
